data.name: By the Vine: Chapter One
data.detailed_description:
By the vine is a Christian-based Visual Novel that takes place in a mysterious world called Edonis. Inhabiting this world is a race called the Cloats, which hold different abilities based on their culture. They were placed under a curse that whenever they sin they become feral. Follow the lives of six young Cloats as they build up their farm and unlock the secrets of the world around them.

Features

  • Christ-centered themes
  • Fully Voiced.
  • Cute animals.
  • Linear story.
  • Whimsical world.
  • Unlockable side stories.
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Wholesome Story
  • Cooking
  • Feed animals

First chapter will free. After the first chapter, a Kickstarter will be made to help fund later chapters.

data.short_description: By the Vine is a Christian-based Visual Novel. The story follows a young adult named Calum, who has to live on his best friend's farm after burning down his house. What hijinks will ensue as Calum adjust to his new life on the farm?
